data.name: TripCandy
data.description:
What is TripCandy?
TripCandy is a platform that allows user to book hotels and accommodation and get rewarded with crypto $CANDY tokens as cashback. 

TripCandy Tokenomics:
Token is built on Binance Smart Chain and a taxation systems that build liquidity pool and rewards wallet holders.

The Taxation is as follow:
Token Name: TripCandy
Token symbol: $CANDY
Token Address:
0x639ad7c49ec616a64e074c21a58608c0d843a8a3
Token Decimal: 18
Total Supply: 1,000,000,000 Tokens
Network: Binance Smart Chain
Mintable: -N.A-
Burn: Automatic burn when there is an odd number of token per reflection distribution, the remainder tokens will be burned

Functions:
There will be a 3% tax per transaction ( Buy/Sell )
•  1% will be distributed among all wallet holders
•  1% will be paid to the deployment operation wallet
•  1% will be added to the Liquidity Pool
 
What make TripCandy so special?

TripCandy is the first of its kind, offering cashback rewards using its very own crypto tokens.
Its unique tokenomics rewards $CANDY token holders dividends, allowing customers to grow their tokens over time.

How does $CANDY improve your travel experience?

With our unique buyback program, a percentage of the total sale will be returned to the user in the form of $CANDY tokens' for every booking.

To fulfil this, TripCandy buys $CANDY tokens from the market, creating a perpetual and consistent demand and boosting the value of $CANDY tokens over time.

As the value of $CANDY token rises. i.e $5 worth of $CANDY earned today could be value at $300 in the future. Potentially allowing customers to book another travel experience or hotel stay on our platform.

What makes TripCandy so exciting?

• TripCandy works with top accommodation partners, allowing customers to book anywhere around the globe.
• TripCandy issues their own tokens to help save on transaction costs, passing these cost-savings back to customers by offering them higher cashback returns of up to 15%.
• The buyback program gives $CANDY tokens a boost in value over time. Allowing investors withness growth in their $CANDY investments.
• TripCandy allows multiple payment channels from crypto payment, banks transfer, E-Wallet payment. Opening up access to customers from South East Asia, Middle-East, Latin America and India.
• Easy withdrawal system. Unlike most cashback programs that requires a minimum., TripCandy has no minimum withdrawal limit.
• $CANDY tokens earned can be easily converted to FIAT currency

About TripCandy Team:

TripCandy consists of a group of young, passionate, and talented individuals from the crypto and traveling industry with strong business acumen and technical knowledge to lead the company.
